name: crowdsec
description: CrowdSec is a collaborative, open-source security engine that detects and blocks malicious traffic. It uses behavior-based detection and shares threat intelligence with the community while enabling self-hosted deployment.
features: Behavior Detection: Identify threats based on patterns, not signatures. Catch new attacks.
Collaborative Security: Share threat intelligence with global community. Stronger together.
Automatic Blocking: Stop malicious traffic before it reaches services. Proactive protection.
Multi-Service Support: Protect web servers, SSH, databases, and more. Universal security.
Bouncer System: Deploy countermeasures across firewalls and proxies. Flexible defense.
Self-Hosted: Keep security data and decisions under your control. Privacy-focused protection.
